籤詩版本二:
Popanda chiphunzitso palibe banja Chitsiru chotengera madzi chili ngati duwa lomwe lagwa.
Ukapempha kuti akukomere mtima umafunika kukwanitsa, koma pamapeto pake udzaona kuti zonse zili pamavuto.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ndi chizindikiro cha kutsekeka mu Dao la munthu wopusa.
Khalani osamala mu chilichonse ndikudikirira nthawi.
解曰: Osanena chabwino kapena cholakwika. Muyenera kusamala. Mtima wolondola. Kupewa tsoka.
籤詩故事一:
◇Yin Jiao akumana ndi aphunzitsi ake
Yin Jiao anali mwana wa Mfumu Zhou ya Mzera wa Shang, ndipo ankalambira Guang Chengzi monga mphunzitsi wake. Patapita zaka zitatu, iye anaphunzira zamatsenga, ndipo atatsika m’phirimo, analumbirira Guangchengzi kuti sadzathandiza Mfumu Zhou kuchita zoipa ndipo akathawira kwa Mfumu Wen.
Ali m'njira, adalimbikitsidwa kupita kunyumba kuti akathandize Mfumu Zhou. Mbuyeyo anapita kukamunyengerera, ndipo mbuye ndi wophunzira anamenyana. Pambuyo pake, Jiang Ziya ndi Ran Deng wa Taoist anatsekereza Yin Jiao pakati pa mapiri awiri ndipo Guang Chengzi adawafolerera mpaka kufa. Poyankha lumbiro lomwe (Yin Jiao) adalumbira.
聖意: Ndilibe mtendere kunyumba ndili pachiwopsezo, ndikupempha ndalama, kugulitsa ndikovuta, kukwatiwa ndikovuta, ndikupemphera madalitso, anthu akutsekereza minda, mphutsi za silika zachuluka. nyama, masoka achuluka, ndikuyang'ana anthu, ndili pamavuto, ndili pamavuto, ndili pamavuto, ndili pamavuto, ndili pamavuto, ndili pamavuto, ndili pamavuto. m'mavuto.
第X籤: Kusaina kwa makumi awiri ndi zinayi
